notifications.title: Redis Community Edition and Redis Stack 7.4 - now GA!
notifications.body:
7.4 includes the highly requested hash field expiration feature, new vector data types to significantly reduce â€Œmemory usage, and time series insertion filters.

Check out the blog post for more details.

Get it from Docker.

notifications.title: Missing a feature or found a bug?
notifications.body:
Would you like to see specific features added or have a bug to report?

Share it with us!

And star the repository if you like RedisInsight!
